message: I'll take the lion's share, but I want to be fair. Let's start with this.  We can negotiate more if you want to keep playing.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! I'm more than fair, but time is money. Let's settle this quickly. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the circumstances.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  We both lose with every passing round.  50/50 is the fairest way to split the remaining value.
